data.title: Cultural Orientation Glossary
data.meta_description: To unify and harmonize the translation of Cultural Orientation terms most used in the Cultural Orientation classroom, CORE has created the Multilingual Cultural Orientation Glossary in nine languages – Arabic, Burmese, Dari, Pashto, Kinyarwanda, Russian, Spanish, Swahili (Congolese), and Ukrainian. Interpreters can use these lists to assist in supporting the complete and accurate delivery of [...]Read More... from Cultural Orientation Glossary – Dari
data.text: To unify and harmonize the translation of Cultural Orientation terms most used in the Cultural Orientation classroom, CORE has created the Multilingual Cultural Orientation Glossary in nine languages – Arabic, Burmese, Dari, Pashto, Kinyarwanda, Russian, Spanish, Swahili (Congolese), and Ukrainian. Interpreters can use these lists to assist in supporting the complete and accurate delivery of Cultural Orientation.
